report.title: UKBMS Specific GIS Section Details
report.description: UKBMS specific: lists section details for use with GIS orientated downloads.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM locations_websites lw JOIN locations l ON l.id=lw.location_id and l.deleted=false JOIN locations section ON section.parent_id=l.id and section.deleted=false LEFT JOIN (termlists_terms ttl1 JOIN termlists_terms ttl2 ON ttl2.meaning_id=ttl1.meaning_id and ttl2.deleted=false JOIN terms t ON t.id=ttl2.term_id and t.deleted=false ) ON ttl1.id=l.location_type_id and ttl1.deleted=false #joins# WHERE lw.deleted=false AND #website_filter# AND (CAST(l.location_type_id AS character varying)='#location_type_id#' OR '#location_type_id#'='' OR t.term='#location_type_id#') AND (GeometryType(section.boundary_geom) = 'LINESTRING' OR GeometryType(section.boundary_geom) = 'MULTILINESTRING')

param.name: location_type_id
param.description: Select the parent site location type, or leave blank to not filter by location type.

param.name: locattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of location attribute IDs to include
